Name: TrainingProtocol
Description: Holds information for training a network for a given batch. This mostly deals with calculating error.

Properties.Name: requiredOutputNodes
Properties.Description: A list of nodes used for the error calculation.

Properties.Name: learningRate
Properties.Description: Learning rate for the given optimizer.

Properties.Name: optimizer
Properties.Description: Optimizer used for changing parameters to reduce error.

MandatoryArgs.Name: learningRate
MandatoryArgs.Description: Learning rate for the given optimizer.

MandatoryArgs.Name: optimizer
MandatoryArgs.Description: Optimizer used for changing parameters to reduce error.

Functions.Name: applyGradients

MandatoryArgs.Name: trainableVariables
MandatoryArgs.Description: A list of all of the trainable parameters in the network.

Functions.Description: Applies gradients to tf.Variables in the network to optimize the network.

Functions.Name: geError

MandatoryArgs.Name: networkOutputs
MandatoryArgs.Description: A list of the outputs of the requestedOutputs in the order they are in the property.

MandatoryArgs.Name: getErrorArgs
MandatoryArgs.Description: A list of arguments needed to compute the error.

Functions.Description: Produces a value for error based on the value of requiredOutputNodes. It calls getValue on each outputNode. Made to be overwritten.

Notes: This is made as an argument for Network.train .
